text: FBG Duck discography has 1 studio albums, 8 mixtapes, 18 singles and 3 collaborative projects. A key figure in the Chicago drill scene, From his early independent releases like Look At Me (2013) to major label releases like Big Clout (2018) to breakout singles like “Slide” (2018). Since his passing in August 2020, his posthumous releases continued to add to his discography. == Albums == === Studio albums === List of studio albums, with selected details and chart positions Title
